channel.title: 🏢 University of South Denmark on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of South Denmark on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Recursive PAC-Bayes: A Frequentist Approach to Sequential Prior Updates with No Information Loss
item.description: Recursive PAC-Bayes: A frequentist method enabling sequential prior updates without information loss, resulting in significantly tighter generalization bounds.
